mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(_id,18) AS DECIMAL)) AS maxcol FROM ac_timetable
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ac_timetable ( _id, title, description, `start`, `end`, `type`, username, backgroundColor, textColor, allDay ) VALUES ( #{_id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{start}, #{end}, #{type}, #{username}, #{backgroundColor}, #{textColor}, #{allDay} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ac_timetable SET title=#{title}, description=#{description}, `start`=#{start}, `end`=#{end}, `type`=#{type}, backgroundColor=#{backgroundColor}, allDay=#{allDay} WHERE _id=#{_id}
